alarms.health_impact: Stay hydrated and avoid prolonged sun exposure
Use caution when outdoors, especially for the elderly

alarms.message: Moderate rain alert: 8.2 mm in last hour
alarms.health_impact: Reduced visibility while driving, bring umbrella and waterproof clothing
Use caution when driving and allow extra travel time

alarms.message: Extreme heat forecast in next 24 hours: Up to 36.2°C expected
alarms.health_impact: Prepare for extreme heat conditions, ensure cooling and hydration

alarms.message: Freezing temperatures forecast in next 24 hours: Down to -2.3°C expected
alarms.health_impact: Prepare for freezing conditions, ensure heating and warm clothing

alarms.message: Heavy rain forecast in next 24 hours
alarms.health_impact: Prepare for potential flooding and travel disruptions

alarms.message: Strong winds forecast in next 24 hours
alarms.health_impact: Secure loose objects and prepare for potential power outages

alarms.message: Storm conditions (heavy rain and strong winds) forecast in next 24 hours
alarms.health_impact: Stay indoors if possible, avoid travel, and prepare for power outages
